author: cms-sw
body:
This changes should report the CMSSW PR numbers in the PR test summary results e.g. instead of 
```
The following merge commits were also included on top of IB + this PR after doing git cms-merge-topic:
067a360
3405700
6ab9424
```
now it should report
```
The following merge commits were also included on top of IB + this PR after doing git cms-merge-topic:
 - pr number1
  author: title
 - pr number2
  author: title
 - pr number3
  author: title
```
title: Report merged PR numbers and ignore private merges
